events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review your details shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering roles as a developer position based on your resume.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to your application for further processing.
The initial screening interview was successfully completed and your technical skills have been preliminarily assessed.
You responded promptly to our screening results and expressed eagerness to proceed with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-06 at 10 AM UTC with the engineering panel.
You completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities and coding expertise.
Following your technical interview, an HR interview was scheduled for 2024-05-09 to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
You completed the HR interview, conveying your career goals and alignment with company values effectively.
An official job offer has been proposed to you for the Software Engineer role, including salary and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You formally accepted the offer, confirming your start date and readiness to begin your role as Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and initial training scheduled for your new position.
The hiring process is now officially closed. Welcome aboard as the newest member of our engineering team.
